comments_limitations: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3). The year format refers to the two years covered by the data, from April of the first year to March of the following year. For example, 2017/18 covers the period of April 2017 to March 2018. This indicator is being used as an approximation of the UN SDG Indicator. Where possible, we will work to identify or develop UK data to meet the global indicator specification. This indicator has been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
